Effects.Full:
Recovery Mode: Decreases damage received by 30% and Stability damage received by 2 points. This cannot be dispelled

Frenzy Mode: Increases ATK and DEF by 30%. At the end of the action, increases Contamination Gauge by 2 points. This cannot be dispelled

Movement Increase II: Increases movement speed by 2 tiles. This is considered as a buff

Toxic: Applies Corrosion weakness on the enemy standing on it. Deals fixed damage equivalent to 50% of the caster's ATK and applies Stability Imbalance I that lasts for 2 turns on the enemy standing on it at the end of the action. This tile is considered as a Corrosion type tile

Stability Imbalance I: Increases damage dealt to Stability by 1 points. This is considered as a debuff

Dream Guardian: Increases damage dealt by AoE support attacks by 30%. This is considered as a buff and cannot be dispelled

Nightmare Shield: Before being attacked, decreases the attacker's ATK by 5%, and dispels 1 random debuff from self. If the attacker countered the holder's weakness, decreases damage received by 30%. This effect can only activate once, and is considered as a Corrosion type buff

Sleep Aid Kit: Increases damage dealt by 10%. This can be stacked up to 2 times, is considered as a buff and cannot be dispelled

Toxic Shroud: Increases Corrosive damage received by 25%. This is considered as a Corrosion type debuff

Nightmare: Increases AoE damage by 10%, increases AoE support damage by 50%, and changes the damage type of AoE support damage to Corrosive damage. This is considered as a Corrosion buff and cannot be dispelled

Concentrated Acid II: Decreases DEF by 20%. This effect is considered as a Corrosion type debuff

Basic.Description:
Selects an enemy target within a 8 tile radius and deals Physical damage equivalent to 80% ATK to it

When in Frenzy Mode, deals Corrosive damage, and increases damage dealt to Stability by 2 points
Basic.Fixed Key 1: Bedtime Warmup: After activation, gains 1 random buff for 1 turn
Basic.Fixed Key 5: Bedtime Warmup: Before activation, dispels 2 buffs from the target

Skill.Description:
Selects an enemy target within a 8 tile radius and deals AoE Corrosive damage equivalent to 130% ATK to it and all enemies within a 1 tile radius of the target

When in Frenzy Mode, gains Movement Increase II for 1 turn, and generates Toxic tiles within the skill's range that lasts for 2 turns
Skill.Vertebrae 4:
Increases Stability damage dealt by 2 points

When in Frenzy Mode, increases damage dealt by the next basic attack by 100%, and deals fixed damage equivalent to 50% ATK to all enemies within range
Skill.Fixed Key 3: Dreamquake: Before attacking, inflicts Concentrated Acid II on large targets for 2 turns

Skill2.Description:
Recovers 6 Stability, cleanses all debuffs from self, and applies Dream Guardian to all allies within a 8 tiles radius for 2 turns

When in Frenzy Mode, Dreamquake or Bedtime Warmup can be used after this skill, and gains 1 layer of Sleep Aid Kit for 2 turns
Skill2.Vertebrae 3:
Increases the maximum stacks of Sleep Aid Kit by 1. Restores HP equivalent to 30% max HP for self. Restores HP equivalent to 15% of Mechty's max HP and recovers 3 Stability to the lowest HP ally

When in Frenzy Mode, increases the number of Sleep Aid Kit stacks gained by 1
Skill2.Fixed Key 4: Dreamless Night: Generates Toxic tiles in a 2 tile radius around the nearest enemy that lasts for 2 turns

Ultimate.Description:
Removes Recovery Mode and activates Frenzy Mode for 3 turns. When Frenzy Mode ends, returns back to Recovery Mode

Applies Nightmare Shield to all allies, and applies Toxic Shroud on the nearest enemy for 1 turn
Ultimate.Vertebrae 1:
Recovery Mode will not be removed when entering into Frenzy Mode

Nightmare Shield decreases the attacker's ATK by 10% and increases the number of debuffs cleansed by 1 instead

New effect is added for Frenzy Mode - increases CRIT rate of basic attacks by 30%
Ultimate.Vertebrae 5: New effect is added for Frenzy Mode - increases movement speed by 2 tiles, at the end of the action, applies Nightmare Shield to allies without Nightmare Shield, and increases Contamination Gauge by 3 points instead

Passive.Description: At the start of the battle, Mechty enters into Recovery Mode, and applies Nightmare for all allies
Passive.Vertebrae 2: New effect is added for Recovery Mode  - increases damage dealt by basic attacks by 50%. At the start of the turn, cleanses 2 debuffs from self
Passive.Vertebrae 6:
New effect is added for Recovery Mode - Increases Corrosive damage dealt by allies by 25%, increases CRIT DMG dealt by basic attacks by 80%

New effect is added for Nightmare - Increases AoE support damage by 80% instead, increases Stability damage dealt by 1 point, and increases AoE damage dealt by 20% instead

1.Effect:

Nightmare Shield decreases the attacker's ATK by 10% and increases the number of debuffs cleansed by 1 instead

New effect is added for Frenzy Mode - increases CRIT rate of basic attacks by 30%

7.Effect: Bedtime Warmup: After activation, gains 1 random buff for 1 turn

8.Effect: If Mechty countered the enemy's weakness, applies Toxic Shroud on the target after attacking

9.Effect: Dreamquake: Before attacking, inflicts Concentrated Acid II on large targets for 2 turns

10.Effect: Dreamless Night: Generates Toxic tiles in a 2 tile radius around the nearest enemy that lasts for 2 turns

12.Effect: If Mechty has 2 or more buffs, decreases damage received from single target attacks by 20%

13.Effect: ATK +5.0% / Increases damage dealt by basic attacks by 20%
